column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Angela - Thank you for your great review! I'm happy to know you've enjoyed all of your dining experiences with us. With assistance from our corporate headquarters
column2: we aim to provide new tapas and ramen dishes every month. The most popular dishes
column4: will most always remain on the menu or will be offered as an "off-menu" item. Due to constraints of space and availability
column5: we can only print a fixed number of items on our permanent menus. But we'll always have a "Monthly Specials" menu that the host will provide when you are seated. Thanks again
column6: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
